definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The Portland Trailblazers have been doing bad this year.
sentences.chinese: 波特兰开拓者是做坏今年。

sentences.english: He is recognized as a pioneer of special effects photography predating digital imaging.
sentences.chinese: 他被视为早于数字图像的特效摄影开拓者。

sentences.english: Actually, this trade is likely to be totally irrelevant. But Wafer can shoot the rock, and Portland likes shooters.
sentences.chinese: 但是瓦佛能在三分线外出手，而开拓者喜欢射手。

sentences.english: The Blazers are a half-game ahead of the Rockets in the West standings.
sentences.chinese: 开拓者目前领先火箭半个胜场。

sentences.english: Youth and inexperience are catching up with the Portland Trail Blazers .
sentences.chinese: 年轻和缺乏经验正在困扰波特兰开拓者队。

sentences.english: Some of the tribe attacked settlers working in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 一些部落会趁著开拓者在田野工作时，攻击殖民者。

sentences.english: The Market Fundies will not acknowledge the failings in their system.
sentences.chinese: 市场开拓者不会承认他们资本主义体系中的失败。

sentences.english: Early settlers also killed beavers for their meat.
sentences.chinese: 早期的开拓者也捕杀河狸，取它们的肉。

sentences.english: Where are the earlier practitioners of such cutting-edge science now?
sentences.chinese: 从事尖端科学研究的早期开拓者如今在哪里？

sentences.english: Many of the old puritan colonist retain their factious temperament in the new world.
sentences.chinese: 许多清教徒开拓者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气。

sentences.english: Free advantage in favor of the Blazers who made 25 of their 37 attempts.
sentences.chinese: 开拓者今天抓住了在罚球线上的机会，37罚25中。
我们的课程计划名为开拓者。

sentences.english: Pioneers like Sal Khan are already showing how effective online tools can be.
sentences.chinese: 像开拓者萨尔可汗已经展示了在线工具的高效率。

sentences.english: One of the subject exploiters and founders of China pre-stressed concrete structure.
sentences.chinese: 中国预应力混凝土结构学科的开拓者和奠基之一。

sentences.english: The pioneers settled down in the area in spite of the barrenness of the land.
sentences.chinese: 尽管土地荒芜，开拓者们还是在这一带定居下来。

sentences.english: He stayed prone on the court under the Blazers' basket for several moments before he was taken away by stretcher.
sentences.chinese: 他在开拓者篮下侧躺了一会，然后被担架抬走了。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
